pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correlation-Adjusted Regression Survival (CARS) Scores // Contains functions to estimate the Correlation-Adjusted Regression Survival (CARS) Scores. The method is described in Welchowski, T. and Zuber, V. and Schmid, M., (2018), Correlation-Adjusted Regression Survival Scores for High- Dimensional Variable Selection, arXiv:1802.08178.
